entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor - Inherited CascadingTypeParameter #44019
  • Quarantine ClosingTheBrowserWindow_GracefullyDisconnects_TheCurrentCircuit #44017
    8.0-MQ
  • Add WebApplicationBuilderSettingInvalidApplicationWillFailAssemblyLoadForUserSecrets back #44016
  • Logging - How to always have application name or moniker included in logged messages #44012
  • Add analyzers introduced in .NET 7 to docs page #44009
    7.0.0
  • Support for pagination #44008
    Discussions
  • Error when using auth with prerendering after trimming #44007
  • This is by design. `FromBody` uses serializers such as Newtonsoft.Json which have a different feature set compared to model binding. Model binding - indicated by `FromQuery`, `FromRoute` etc, requires that complex types have a parameterless constructor. #44006
  • New endpoints exposed by OpenAPI documentation compared to before ASP.NET Core 7 RC1 #44005
    7.0.0
  • Publishing hosted Blazor WASM project breaks if not self-contained #44003
  • Razor Pages 404 after updating to ASP.NET Core 7 RC1 #44002
  • Enhance the RemoveLoginAsync method of the UserManager class #44000
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_actix, https #43999

Closed

  • w/return results blocks client receive pipeline #41996
    7.0-rc2
  • Opting out of Developer exception page during development #43870
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Blazor webassembly msal does not work with scopes on multiple resources #33241
    7.0-rc2
  • Blazor WASM (.NET6) does not allow AAD Authentication when Deployed to Azure Web app #37206
    7.0-rc2
  • Blazor WASM Net 6 Preview 4 Azure AD - There was an error trying to log you in: 'Cannot read property 'toLowerCase' of undefined' #33312
    7.0-rc2
  • RemoteAuthenticatorView LogInFailed doesn't expose error message with MSAL redirect #26284
    7.0-rc1
  • Blazor RemoteAuthenticatorView OnLogOutSucceeded Callback results in multiple log out attempts. #30943
    7.0-rc2
  • [Blazor] [WebAssembly] Improve logging on the authentication package. #29633
    7.0-rc2
  • SignalR C++ Client Bug #43964
  • Blazor Web Assembly AAD Auth under .Net 5.0 cannot request multiple tokens #29384
    7.0-rc2
  • Angular universal with .net 6 #43970
  • Blazor WASM MSAL authentication not working when app is trimmed #43293
    7.0-rc2
  • Error retrieving the current token in a Blazor application after successful authentication in Azure B2C with Msal #39311
    7.0-rc2
  • Blazor Auth: Replace history entry on navigating to IdP login/register endpoints to avoid navigation cycle #43063
    7.0-rc2
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #43986
  • Accepts Extension method for null Content-Type in Minimal API #43794
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Only add MethodInfo to route handler endpoints #44021
    area-runtime, area-web-frameworks
  • Allow zero byte reads on the test server response body #44020
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • Quarantine ClosingTheBrowserWindow_GracefullyDisconnects_TheCurrentCi… #44018
    area-blazor
  • Remove unneeded generic params from test case #44011
    area-runtime
  • `IsCharWhitespace` for HTML5 spec without char[].IndexOf #44004
    area-mvc, community-contribution

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #44013
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] [SignalR] Unblock user callbacks when waiting for client result #44014
    area-signalr
  • Add Error Logging for the Blazor DebugProxyLauncher #43721
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, feature-blazor-debugging, 7.0-rc2
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #43997
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution
  • Changing to use the non-generic WriteAsJsonAsync #43960
    area-web-frameworks
  • Improve file fallback routing behavior when using ConsumesAttribute #43984
    area-runtime
  • Update facebook OAuth API version to 14, google to v3 #43982
    area-security, 8.0-preview1
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #43980
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1 #43951
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.30

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 1994592 #43956
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix URL building for SPA proxying #43407
    area-mvc, feature-spa, community-contribution
  • Fix ProjectTemplate test failure logs on helix #43789
    area-mvc
  • Remove attributes from SVG elements #43957
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • feat: use the value of the variable directly #43793
    area-commandlinetools, community-contribution
  • source-build: support building aspnetcore using non-portable runtime packages. #43937
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Update versions for 7.0.0 RTM #43992
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0.0
  • [Blazor wasm] Use provided loadBootResource function to override how config is loaded #43969
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Add CssClass property to ValidationSummary #43928
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Better logs in AuthorizationMiddleware #43862
    area-security, community-contribution
  • [release/3.1] Stop building on Ubuntu 18.04 #43666
    area-infrastructure
  • Triggering IConnectionLifetimeNotificationFeature on GoAway #43431
    area-runtime, community-contribution
